      • loadCoursesFromFile

        public void loadCoursesFromFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Loads course records into the catalog. Any FileNotFoundExceptions are caught and an IllegalArgumentException is thrown to the client.
        Parameters:
        fileName - file containing list of students
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - to the client if a FileNotFoundException is caught.

      • addCourseToCatalog

        public boolean addCourseToCatalog(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String title,
                                  java.lang.String section,
                                  int credits,
                                  java.lang.String instructorId,
                                  int enrollmentCap,
                                  java.lang.String meetingDays,
                                  int startTime,
                                  int endTime)
        add a course to the catalog using given imformation
        Parameters:
        name - name
        title - title
        section - section
        credits - credits
        instructorId - instructor ID
        enrollmentCap - course's enrollment cap
        meetingDays - meetinf days
        startTime - start time of course
        endTime - end time of course
        Returns:
        whether the course can be added
